levels.name: Counting Start
levels.description: Master basic addition with single digits
levels.description_long: Get comfortable with adding single digit numbers. You need to answer at least 4 out of 5 questions correctly.

levels.name: Double Digits
levels.description: Add two-digit numbers together

levels.name: Big Numbers
levels.description: Add three-digit numbers

levels.name: Mega Numbers
levels.description: Add four-digit numbers

levels.name: Addition Speed Run
levels.description: Add numbers quickly under time pressure

levels.name: Subtraction Start
levels.description: Learn basic subtraction with single digits

levels.name: Two Digit Minus
levels.description: Subtract two-digit numbers

levels.name: Three Digit Minus
levels.description: Subtract three-digit numbers

levels.name: Subtraction Mastery
levels.description: Advanced subtraction with four digits

levels.name: Multiply Basics
levels.description: Master simple multiplication tables

levels.name: Two Digit Multiply
levels.description: Multiply two-digit numbers

levels.name: Multiplication Master
levels.description: Multiply three-digit numbers

levels.name: Division Basics
levels.description: Learn basic division

levels.name: Two Digit Divide
levels.description: Divide two-digit numbers

levels.name: Division Master
levels.description: Divide three-digit numbers

levels.name: Mixed Ops Intro
levels.description: Solve problems with two operations

levels.name: Complex Operations
levels.description: Multiple operations with two digits

levels.name: Advanced Mixed Math
levels.description: Complex operations with three digits

levels.name: Expert Complex
levels.description: Expert level complex operations

levels.name: Speed Challenge Plus
levels.description: Complete complex operations quickly

levels.name: Addition Extreme
levels.description: Large number addition challenge

levels.name: Subtraction Extreme
levels.description: Large number subtraction challenge

levels.name: Multiplication Extreme
levels.description: Four-digit multiplication challenge

levels.name: Division Extreme
levels.description: Four-digit division challenge

levels.name: Master Challenge
levels.description: The ultimate math challenge with all operations

levels.name: Legendary Speed Run
levels.description: Complete 20 extreme operations in 120 seconds
